about_the_game:
■Authorized by the world’s top wealthy families to build your own galactic battleship
In the game, you can use traditional wealthy teams to reach the top of the world, or you can recruit world-renowned current and legendary stars to form a galactic battleship to challenge the world's powerful players!

■Player data is updated in real time, and new selected players are online
2024 player, coach data and transfer information are updated. Players who perform well in real life will appear as "selected players". The real performance of players will affect the status of players in the game!

■Collect and develop player lineups, a real player trading market
The game contains thousands of real players authorized by FIFPro. Whether it is Cristiano Ronaldo and Haaland, or a rookie who has just emerged, they can all shine in your lineup. Make real-time free agent trades in the trade market with real players instead of facing a fake system store. Earn transfer fees through your skills and buy your favorite players on the market.

■Adjust offensive and defensive strategies in real time, and freely switch formations during the game
Falling behind and want to make a big push? Or want to stabilize the defense after taking the lead? Adjust the team's offensive mentality at any time during the game, or pause the game to change the team's formation! Now all coaches can arrange several formations such as 442, 433, 4312, etc.!

■Real-time PVP fair competition opens a new era of football e-sports
You can play a game anytime, anywhere with friends around you in live football, or try your hand at the ladder competition and compete for the ladder ranking; you can also participate in e-sports events, break through the ranks, and challenge the top live players in the country!
detailed_description:
■Authorized by the world’s top wealthy families to build your own galactic battleship
In the game, you can use traditional wealthy teams to reach the top of the world, or you can recruit world-renowned current and legendary stars to form a galactic battleship to challenge the world's powerful players!

■Player data is updated in real time, and new selected players are online
2024 player, coach data and transfer information are updated. Players who perform well in real life will appear as "selected players". The real performance of players will affect the status of players in the game!

■Collect and develop player lineups, a real player trading market
The game contains thousands of real players authorized by FIFPro. Whether it is Cristiano Ronaldo and Haaland, or a rookie who has just emerged, they can all shine in your lineup. Make real-time free agent trades in the trade market with real players instead of facing a fake system store. Earn transfer fees through your skills and buy your favorite players on the market.

■Adjust offensive and defensive strategies in real time, and freely switch formations during the game
Falling behind and want to make a big push? Or want to stabilize the defense after taking the lead? Adjust the team's offensive mentality at any time during the game, or pause the game to change the team's formation! Now all coaches can arrange several formations such as 442, 433, 4312, etc.!

■Real-time PVP fair competition opens a new era of football e-sports
You can play a game anytime, anywhere with friends around you in live football, or try your hand at the ladder competition and compete for the ladder ranking; you can also participate in e-sports events, break through the ranks, and challenge the top live players in the country!
name: Football Clubs 实战十一人

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: win7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster

short_description: Welcome to FIFpro's officially authorized operating card football game. A console game experience using 3D original engine and next-generation modeling. Collect the world's top star lineup and instantly compete with your friends in a global game.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese*, Finnish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
